title: Direct X problem
body: After everyone chose there champs game starts up however, it crashed on me so I try to restart and re connect, the game would not give me the option of reconnecting, like the button to reconnect was never there. It just kept saying game in progress and said that that i was already in game. Well i was not in game, i was stuck outside the game unable to reconnect and as a result the game counted me as afk. Now this didnt happen once but twice in a row but, the second time it said it was a DirectX problem. I will probably get a afk ban for this but, something like this has never been a problem except now, so wondering why this is happening and could I get this possible ban lifted? Because this is something that is out of my control. I wont ask for a lp compensation since for these 2 afk games that i couldnt control, i went from 80 to 21 Riot please help

replies.body:
Was the directX problem resulting a bugsplat?  This seems like a driver failure or even outdated products failing to dender the game.  Make sure to update your operating system as soon as you can, and follow the steps in our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot.  

We cannot alter game stats or [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties, and even if it was unintentional these leaves still cause others a negative experience.  Go through the guide and test it out in a custom game as well to prevent any penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!
